website_summaries.verdict: Although you may need help from a jeweler if you have to adjust it, this bracelet earns our top marks for its design, durable material, and looks that are practical and pleasing for both men and women.
pros: Attractive styling is suitable for men and women
Made to last and resist corrosion, as it's crafted in surgical grade steel
Can be engraved with various conditions and medications
cons: Some reports of the clasp being difficult to open/close
Although it comes with a link removal tool, it is flimsy and removing links isn't easy

customer_reviews.title: High quality medic alert.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bracelet. It was delivered in short order, in excellent condition. It comes with an amazing set-up that allows even an elderly woman, with bad eyes and zero mechanical skills, to adjust the band length. It took me but a few minutes and the bracelet fits perfectly. It is made with solid quality and I anticipate it will last me for many years to come. Thank you to the creative people who made this medic alert possible.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: I added the photo with the dollar for scale and the other just to show how it looks when worn.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived quickly as expected. Good quality. Easily adjustable I had to remove two links to make it fit. I would definitely recommend to a friend. It fits comfortably and I am very sensitive to nickel in metals and so far this bracelet has caused no reaction. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Windsor

customer_reviews.title: VERY HIGH QUALITY - BUY IT !
customer_reviews.text: FIVE STARS for this medical alert bracelet, it is indeed high quality stainless steel and looks good. The seller was very responsive to my request for extra links and immidiately sent them. If you follow the instructions exactly the link install goes very well with the includded tool. There have been a few reviews that said the link process was faulty HOWEVER they must not have read and understood the instructions. The pins when installed as explained DO NOT fall out and are strong. This is a HIGH QUALITY bracelet that is also very durable. I highly reccomend this product. Respectfully, Dennis, KV4WM, A US Navy Nuclear Submarine Veteran and Amateur Radio Operator.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality bracelet for a reasonable price - Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is a discreet but valuable way of notifying others to my medical situation. Several people have complimented me on my new bracelet not knowing it was medical alert until they looked closer. Due to price I was concerned about the quality. As it turned out the bracelet is of great quality and was very easy to adjust to my size. Everything I needed to make the adjustment was included with the original shipment. Easy to put on and take off. Seller did a nice job of following up to make sure everything went well and offered additional assistance, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Justmetwo

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC quality & packaging
customer_reviews.text: I had breast cancer and a double mastectomy in Feb. 2018 and they removed some lymph nodes in my left arm. I ordered the "No needle/BP this arm" bracelet as a preventative for lymphedema. I was very pleased to see the excellent quality of this product, and they even sent a tool to make it smaller if you have to remove links, which can also be used for watches. It also comes with a nice little drawstring pouch to keep it in. I just got this today, so I'm hoping the surgical steel stays as perfect as it arrived. It's very smooth and flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALTY FOR AN AFFORDABLE PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PRODUCT AT AN AFFORDABLE PRICE. I highly recommend this product for anyone needing a medical alert bracelet. Mine is a DNR. I do not want to be resuscitated and forced to live if my body can not do it on its own. My fate belongs wholly to the universe and I am very happy to have this DNR bracelet on my wrist. It is comfortable and pleasing to the eye as well as being high quality.
customer_reviews.author: spider hacksaw

customer_reviews.title: Be Smart with a Medical Alert ID!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bracelet. It's very pretty, and so light weight that I barely know it's there. Although it came with a tool & extra links to adjust the size, it was perfect for me just as it came. It's always a smart idea to have a medical alert device should an emergency arise, and I feel safer with this bracelet. I also appreciate the medical alert card that came with the bracelet. I completed the info on the card & it will be in my wallet at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful styling and the company that makes got it to me quickly.
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this bracelet for me. I wanted something not just functional, but attractive. It's delicate looking, but very solid and strong. The bracelet is so comfortable, I forget I'm wearing it. It's so pretty I can confidently wear it when I'm dressed up for a night on the town. I needed links taken out and my husband was totally impressed with the tool that came with it. It was so easy to adjust. I'm so happy that I have a medical bracelet that could save my life, but does not SCREAM "Medic Alert"!!! I wholeheartedly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Phifer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Surgical Grade Steel Medical Alert ID Bracelet for Men and Women
customer_reviews.text: Apparently you can reject it.. But not legal to wear and not followed if ypu don't pay a doctor or have an Attorney to sign off on it.. in all states. Also, it was very difficult to put it on. And after learning legal points. It was very difficult taking it off and broke.. As usual file 13 again.
customer_reviews.author: John M Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Received my Medical ID bracelet Thursday right on time. Using the printed instructions we took out three links for a perfect fit. I wore it while swimming yesterday and there is no change to the finish, so I know it's going to wear well. In order for it to fit well it's a little bit of a struggle to get it on and clasped but rather have it that way than dangling around on m arm. And anyway, I don't plan on taking it off. It's a very pretty piece of jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and durable
customer_reviews.text: I've now worn the women's Type 2 Diabetes bracelet for over 2 months 24/7. I'm completely pleased with its durable finish that shows no signs of wear and will not tarnish. The ladies version is narrow and not imposing and if you dress up you can rotate it on your wrist so the words will not be visible and it looks nice. This bracelet is well made, is securely clasped and adjusting size is easy with supplied tool. Just don't rush it and align it properly. The red medical icon is still in perfect condition. No fading or flakng. When the time comes I will order this bracelet again. It arrived quickly and packaged in nice box.
customer_reviews.author: HMG

customer_reviews.title: Worst medical bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in January and the letters have already worn off. You would think that this would be important enough for the company to make a decent bracelet. After 4 months, there is no point in wearing it as you cannot read any medical condition on it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: This is a High Quality Medical Alert Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived today. I'm totally impressed with this bracelet. High quality stainless steel. Includes tool for removing or adding links. As a customer, I have definitely received value for my purchase. Because of my larger wrist size, I will be requesting a couple of extra links (that's on me, not them).
customer_reviews.author: Erlo Banfield

customer_reviews.title: Deep Engraving
customer_reviews.text: My concern when ordering this is that the message might be printed on a flat surface, and get scratched off easily. I am happy to report that the message is deeply engraved into the surface. I needed to remove one link, and the included tool made that simple. 316 is a very good quality stainless steel, and I feel this bracelet will give me many years of service. No more rubber bracelets ( that the message wears off of in a few months ) for me. My doctor even commended on how nice it is.
customer_reviews.author: TABco

customer_reviews.title: Great production
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bracelet. Loved 1st one. Good quality, letters visible, easy to read. The new one (letters are light and hard to read even with a flash light. I received an email saying to return it and it would be replaced. I had already put it on and pretty much destroyed box as I have trigger fingers and couldn’t open box w/o ruining box. It. I wished I could return it I’ll hope the paramedics will be able to read the words if anything should happen. It’s a great product just in this one you barely can see lettering which defeats the purpose of the bracelet. Thank you for your response.
customer_reviews.author: UAsked

customer_reviews.title: Men's bracelt is big heavy and it will cost you $8 to return it.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the photos are for the women's bracelet. It's thinner, lighter, and nicer. The Men's bracelet is HEAVY. Heavy enough to tear your skin, heavy enough to prevent you from wearing a watch on the same hand. Heavy thick metal. The bracelet itself seems well made and has a nice tool included to adjust it but returning this HUGE HEAVY thing will set you back $8. Not impressed. Wish there were more pictures of the men's bracelet and more detail about it being so clunky.
customer_reviews.author: pet person

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bracelet. It is very legible and durable and the latch is really strong. I have small wrists and love that I can adjust it easily so it is small enough that it feels good, looks nice, and is not cumbersome. It is smooth all the way around and does not catch on clothing. The only snag, and this is not enough to take away a star, is that some of the red paint came off one of the points of the medical symbol. Still plenty of red to see, I just wish that it hadn't happened. I would still definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: MamaO'4

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, comfortable, good value
customer_reviews.text: I looked around at other bracelets, and I'm glad I got this one. Delivery was on time. It is very comfortable, not scratchy on the wrist. My wrists are not small, and the bracelet "as is" was just right - large enough to slip on without using the clasp, and small enough not to slip off. It is adjustable, but check out other reviews about the tool to add or remove links, because I didn't have to use it. It is also quite attractive to wear. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Moore

customer_reviews.title: Received Epilepsy instead of Pacemaker AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong item AGAIN!! I thought that the mixup was being corrected- but when I received the new order -- the same mistake had been made!!! I wanted this for my husband. Who has a heart condition and a Pacemaker... The quality is great---but it would do no good for him to wear the wrong bracelet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality, clasp bad design
customer_reviews.text: I like the bracelet and found the link removal tool to be very useful and fairly easy to use. It appears to be very durable and is very attractive. I do Not like the clasp - it only opens to a 90 degree angle and the lip that forms the clasp is large enough so that it barely fits through the hole. This makes it very hard to get on and off. Also, the edges of the clasp have sharp corners, which scratch when it hits at the right angle.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E Symmonds

customer_reviews.title: NICELY FINISHED, GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a tool specifically designed to remove links to make the bracelet fit. I would hate to try to do this without the tool! Once you have it set up the way you want it it, it is a finely finished quality bracelet that easily identifies your medical condition. I suspect it will last a long time. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D

customer_reviews.title: Quality is top notch
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the ID bracelet. I liked the fact that you made it easy to remove links to shorten it. I only have two helpful tips - 1) you should recommend the use of tweezers when handling the pins as it was difficult to hold them and reinsert them without tweezers 2) there should be a note to tell the buyer not to remove the pin where the clasp is (I assumed it would fit in any of the links)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sparr

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN FIRST WEEK
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, was nice then fell off while I was doing nothing (walking to my desk) at work. I’m not happy that I spent what I did and now having to deal with this within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The images do not at all show how shiny bright silver it is and how nice the lettering is as it was dark in the room, but wanted to show how big it is without links removed on an average size ladies wrist. Very high quality, beautifully made. Will not distract from any other jewelry you'd wear with it as it looks like a beatiful piece of jewelry itself with the medical sign standing out enough to catch any medical personnel's attention as a medical alert bracelet. Very happy with it. Received a a gift from my son after dialysis access surgery, very nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: K.M

customer_reviews.title: The coloring on the letters is completely gone!
customer_reviews.text: Update - 5/2020 I have had this product for 2 years. The color on the letters is completely gone.Do not buy this product. It will only last 2 years ! This company should send me a new bracelet but I know they won't. Cheaply made product and not worth the money. 4/2019- Very disappointed. The red and black coloring on the letters has come off. Unacceptable. They should send me a new bracelet
customer_reviews.author: whit

customer_reviews.title: Medical Alert Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Received my bracelet yesterday. I was impressed with the high quality of the bracelet and it's attractive appearance. It is as nice looking as any ID bracelet you might buy today. I did need to remove a couple of links which was simple with the link removal kit that came with it. It was just a little tricky with the small pin that had to be reinserted after removal of a link, but it was not anything really problematic. I would recommend this product to anyone needing a medical ID. It is far less expensive than some I have seen and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: jaybee

customer_reviews.title: Nice bracelet
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet does its job. The latch is hard to attach. It is a daily fight, both fastening and unfastening. The tolerances are too tight. It needs to fit with greater clearances. The link removal tool is a piece of junk. It fell apart the first time used and could not be fixed. Most people would have to take it to a jeweler to have a link taken out. I was able to do it because I have jeweler's tools and magnifying glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur S. Valla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product & Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I previously ordered this item but the box and pouch inside were empty. Two (2) days later I received a new bracelet and I am pleased to say that it met all the criteria mentioned in there description of the bracelet and more. I feels and looks better than the higher priced Metal ID Bracelets I had been considering. I am "VERY HAPPY" with the bracelet and the "CUSTOMER SERVICE" from this company!!!! I have other family members in need of these bracelets as well and will be ordering them from from this supplier for them too.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is very nice looking, slim so it is not bulky. The tool for adjusting the size was easy to use along with the very clear and helpful instructions. When my mom was put on warfarin, I wanted to get her an alert bracelet immediately. I was surprised that pharmacies were no longer caring the warfarin alerts. I was very happy to find it on Amazon and have it delivered in just 2 days. Thanks so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda F

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Responsive Company
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is as describe but, of course, hasn't been fully tested since (in that it is a Do Not Resuscitate) bracelet, I am still alive to write this review. However, I did have problems figuring out the clast and, when I wrote to the company, the immediately replied with a very helpful description of what I needed to do, as well as additional information for removing links. So, the company has been wonderfully helpful with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Medical Alert ID Bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bracelet. Excellent quality at a great price. I have only had the bracelet for a few days, but I have worn it daily. It feels so comfortable and it looks like a nice piece of jewelry. The surgical steel is so smooth to the touch. I gave a 5 star rating because of the (1) great quality, (2) great price, (3) comfort in wearing, (4) ease in sizing and (5) prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Nice bracelet - but...
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the bracelet -- It is stylish and comfortable to wear. My only complaint is it was very difficult to adjust the length. I am handy working with tools and it still took me almost an hour to adjust the length. This task can not be accomplished by a person without steady hands, less than very good eyesight, or used to working with small parts.
customer_reviews.author: joe c

customer_reviews.title: An attractive medical ID bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I have very petite arms and this medical alert bracelet is the perfect size. I have been looking for one but they were all very bulky looking. The size is perfect for my arms. I am also very please with the quality. It is a heavy medical grade material. I don't have to worry about it turning colors. My husband adjusted the size and it fits perfectly. I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Bill
customer_reviews.text: Bracelet is well-made and attractive. It is what I wanted. I received 2 emails from seller.The wording "Xarelto" and red alert symbol easy to read, but not too intrusive. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is I had difficulty trying to use tool to remove links. I ended up taking it to a jeweler to have it adjusted. It was all good as he did not charge me.
customer_reviews.author: Greyhound Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted. It's attractive, comfortable, durable and not too obvious, but visible enough that medics, etc. will easily see it. I don't hesitate to wear it. My suggestion is to not get it too snug around the wrist. Keep a couple of extra links in it. It was easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: DNR bracelet does not stop life sustaining treatment/measures  and hard to size
customer_reviews.text: After many attempts, I was unable to remove the links using the tool that was supplied and will have to bring it to a jeweler to resize the band. Also found out from an EMT friend that despite my wearing a DNR (Do Not Resuscitate) bracelet, he would still have to administer life sustaining care if the person could not speak and there were no official medical instruction papers immediately available. Kind of defeats the purpose of the bracelet. The product itself is quite attractive, seems well made and comes in a nice box. Turns out it's better as a gag gift than a medical bracelet since DNR wishes would not be followed simply because someone has the bracelet on.
customer_reviews.author: ivoit

customer_reviews.title: Well made - Looks nice on.
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is nice. The lettering on it is clear and you can see it well. I was able to adjust it with the gadget supplied with it. It was very easy to do. I haven’t taken it off. My skin is sensitive to some fake metal jewelry. This bracelet hasn’t bothered my skin at all. I feel relived to be wearing it just incase I have an emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong. High quality looks like a piece of jewlery!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding medical ID braclet. Narrow width is great making the braclet stylish and has the apearance of a fine piece of jewlrey. Very well made with heavy duty clasp.I am extremely pleased with the quality and style and highly recomend this medical id bracelet!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: attractive & functional
customer_reviews.text: perfect bracelet for my 18 year old. sturdy but still attractive. we've gone through a few other bracelets that irritated his skin, but no problems with this one. we were able to shorten it without difficulty although it took a bit to figure out how to open it and if i was elderly with arthritis i would have needed help. no problems with it unclasping while wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy O

customer_reviews.title: Good looking with great customer support and service
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and feels durable. I have a larger wrist from weight training and requested 3 additional links after l receiving my bracelet. Vendor replied within 1 hour and sent out the links within 4 hours. Excellent customer service. Update:. Received links but no pin to attach them to the bracelet. The hassle factor in trying to expand the bracelet is not worth it. Unless it fits you out of the box, this is junk. Will just toss it and chalk it up to a bad buying decision.
customer_reviews.author: IdahoJoe

customer_reviews.title: Letters faded and easily scratched
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bracelet when I first received it. The links were not to hard to change but it hasn't held up. It's all scratched up and the black lettering has faded. I bought this in May its early October and I'm looking for a new replacement.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: 5 weeks old and finish flaking off
customer_reviews.text: Couple days after return window part of the color flaked off the red medical symbol. Had it 5 weeks. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item. Stylish, good weight and quality material. I needed to remove 5 links and with the provided tool and instructions I was able to do it within 5 minutes. The clasp seems to be very secure so I'm not worried about it catching on clothing and having it come off. Shipping was quick and was well packaged. I would purchase again if needed and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Queenbee

customer_reviews.title: Love this bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted something stylish, discreet and durable which is exactly what I received. I wear it almost 24/7 and it is extremely comfortable. Also the company will send you extra links for free if you send them a message after purchase. For myself being pregnant I wanted the extra links in case my wrists swell during the summer. Fantastic bracelet and the company is really pleasant to work with too. I highly recommend this bracelet!
customer_reviews.author: Jay/San

customer_reviews.title: STYLISH and FUNCTIONAL!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a medical alert bracelet which is fashionable! My super-picky, Type 1 diabetic, 20-year-old daughter has rejected many others, but she actually likes and will wear this bracelet. Very helpful that the seller includes a free sizing tool. I love that it's waterproof and sturdy. Unlike sterling silver, stainless steel won't tarnish. You never have to take it off. I highly recommend this bracelet!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Mom

customer_reviews.title: High quality medical ID bracelet
customer_reviews.text: My wife is extremely satisfied with the quality of this surgical grade stainless steel bracelet. I like that it can be adjusted to fit her small wrist by removing links. She states it is easy to wear and very comfortable. Useful for identifying special medical needs to immediately alert paramedics for device implant. We highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Medic Alert bracelet
customer_reviews.text: It was nicer than I expected it to be. It was a nice weight and good quality. They even provided a "tool" to adjust the size of the bracelet with great instructions. I’m concerned that the clasp might loosen after it’s been opened and closed a lot. I only wear the bracelet when I’m out without my family and friends who know what my condition is if anything happened. So I take it off and on. I don’t wear it in my he shower for fear it my tarnish.
customer_reviews.author: Fran - PVB

customer_reviews.title: Good product but...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bracelet for 6 months and I barely take it off. I love the quality of the band and it fits perfectly (after removing 2 links). The only thing I have a problem with is, the black lettering faded off. I can no longer read the very important message that is supposed to be viewed in an emergency. Kinda defeats the purpose of the bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Will never go back
customer_reviews.text: At first, I scoffed at the price, but I was really tired of the chain link cheapos. I decided to take the plunge before I went to Vegas. This thing is great! It is very clear what it is for, looks of very good quality, is not too heavy and is very stylish over all. The only thing I don't know is how long the writing stays on, but it might be engraved so little worry.
customer_reviews.author: Marcadimus

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied !
customer_reviews.text: Having had pacemaker surgery about 6 months ago I bought this bracelet to wear for identification purposes. I’ve had it for over a month and worn it daily without removing it. It has not tarnished and my skin has not turned green or black like does with the cheap imitations. The writing and emblem is still sharp with no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: HuggsT

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big guy and don’t like the medical bracelets that appear frail and lightweight. This bracelet is nice looking and beefy enough to not look like it will break while wearing it. It’s almost too tight, so I’ve requested an additional link to ensure it will always fit. The included tool to increase or decrease the length is a real nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: tooni

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The tool to adjust this bracelet fell apart on use. I kept putting it back together and it kept falling apart. Without that, it’s useless because you cannot wear the bracelet. I’m an ER physician and I am handy. This is garbage and I resent the waste of my time. This bracelet for health information was needed. I wasted my time and had nothing to show.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Ellen from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality bracelet bearing the practical DNA message.
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful piece of jewelry for a practical purpose. The presentation( including the little black box box and its contents) proved the creator of this bracelet cared very deeply about his design and workmanship and the ultimate recipient. The little tool and extra pieces was generous but a bit startling for an aged person with limited ability to use her fingers and hands. The clasp was difficult to open and close for the same reason. Of course if the recipient is healthier or has a stronger person to help there's no problem. I thought the item was superb and I am proud to wear it and tell others where I obtained it.
customer_reviews.author: H.L. Neubauer (Consignment)

customer_reviews.title: If you can attach clasp, you're a miracle worker.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Company sent instructions which solved the problem. I think it would be helpful to have that in the box. Well made bracelet with ZERO instructions on how to attach it. Only instructions are how to remove links. These and the tool that came were helpful. So fed up trying to undo clasp.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice weight. Not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the bracelet. It’s a nice weight. Not flimsy. The bracelet was too big but it comes with a tool that was really easy to adjust the length. It has a very secure clasp as well. I would highly recommend this bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kay

customer_reviews.title: Durable, rugged, and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Removed one link for a perfect fit. The link pin comes out easily if the removal tool is lined up right. Also, alignment is more likely to achieve if the outer part of the bracelet lies downward atop the tool stage.
customer_reviews.author: Grebe D Byrd

customer_reviews.title: It was easy, I removed 3 links
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet arrived along with a tool to remove links. It was easy, I removed 3 links. At first I thought $30 was a lot for a bracelet but now that I've been wearing it everyday for a month and it's still shiny and doesn't seem to scratch easily I think it's a good buy. I was at the ER and mentioned I was concerned that my bracelet was too pretty, looking like nice jewelry rather than a medic alert. The ER nurse said don't worry, they're trained to look for me fix alert, they'll know what this bracelet is. I love mine and recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: MNgal

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this bracelet. It's comfortable and durable. I barely notice it and never take it off. I was worried it would pinch the hairs on my arm like watches do but I've had no problems with it. The clasp is secure. And it's great you can customize the size to fit your wrist. I have small wrists so it's always difficult to find things that fit right. I took out a couple links and now it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Blue W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but good luck unwrapping it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bracelet BUT it was wrapped tightly in a cellophane weather could not be pulled off. Could not slide it off or unwrap it. Ridiculous. Ended up getting cuticle scissors and carefully cutting right wrappings. Neighbor couldn't get it off either. Suggest they change packaging. Otherwise, very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieO

customer_reviews.title: Best med bracelet ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I have been searching for a bracelet for years that was bigger than 7in. The extra link is so useful even though I don't need it right now. This is so awesome. I can wear it every day. I am so thankful for this and recommend it to everyone who has a condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Weber

customer_reviews.title: Good quality alert bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This medical alert bracelet will do its job. Its plain and simple. If I should have a car accident, responders will know immediately of my needs. Good quality, engraved and painted black in the engraving. I never remove mine,(dishes,cleaning,shower). Condition has remained like new for over a month. It does NOT turn skin green! It comes with a sizing tool, however I didn't need to use it. I like to wear mine loose. Packaged nicely also.
customer_reviews.author: gotcha02

customer_reviews.title: When she needed a MedID bracelet, this one was her choice
customer_reviews.text: While planning for my wife's pacemaker surgery, I told her to choose a Med Id bracelet and I would get it for her after the surgery. I thought that it was important to identify her as a Pacemaker person in an emergency. I wanted her to select one that she liked and I wanted it in stainless steel as well. This Bracelet is of excellent quality as well as very attractive. My wife is very pleased with this quality bracelet. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Classy.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a better quality men’s bracket and this is it. I have had mine for a month or so. It is probably a little heavier than cheaper bracelets, but not overly so. It is well made and won’t scratch. A simple tool is included to make link detachment easy. I have a normal guy’s wrist and took out one link. The clasp is very secure so removing for showers is not easy nor really necessary. Wording is indented with black ink. My wife painted some clear nail polish over the print just to be sure. Bottom line: a well designed product that would go well with a classy wrist watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased two other DNR bracelets that have proven to be less than quality products. This one has them beat! I highly recommend this product. It comes with a link removal tool that, itself, is well made. It is a very attractive bracelet made of smooth steel so it is comfortable, yet clearly gets the message across to first responders.
customer_reviews.author: Bob The Builder

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't wear well with use
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive. Easy to size. I particularly like that there are no rough edges to catch on my compression sleeve. Update: I've had this for 6 months and wear 24/7. Appearance is scuffed up and the black has come off one of the letters. I had hoped it would be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Compusew

customer_reviews.title: Decent medical alert bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This a very durable bracelet. I’ve had it for almost a year now. However, the paint of the lettering came off months ago, so I need to buy a new one. It’s way too big and I had to remove several links, which was very easy to do. Only complaint, is the lettering wearing off.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and well made Medical ID bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable medical ID bracelet I have ever worn. It has a perfect weight to it, it's slim and looks good on. Very quality made. I like that it is smooth and doesn't catch on my clothes. I took out 1 link and the tool sent with the bracelet worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The red has come off medical symbol this is not acceptable. Please replace
customer_reviews.author: J & E

customer_reviews.title: Prettier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I just received my bracelet. It takes a minute to adjust the links to the right size because it is very tiny screws but a jeweler could do it super quick i'm sure. it's really much prettier than I expected. Definitely recommend. I can't vouch for durability yet because it is two days old. But so far I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Feig

customer_reviews.title: Medical Alert ID Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This Bracelet was delivered in a timely manner but the "Clasp" that connects and closes the Bracelet on the wrist was "Missing." Hence the Bracelet is useless. I would like a new one sent r my money back.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and very stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is the second medical bracelet I have purchased from this seller. The quality of these bracelets is very high and they actually look stylish. The clasp is very sturdy and the links don’t catch in my wrist hair. I would highly recommend these medical bracelets to anyone needing one. Until recently I had no need to wear one, but now I can ill afford to be without one. Thank you Smarter LifeStyle.
customer_reviews.author: NightThumper

customer_reviews.title: Link removal tool included! Best feature ever!
customer_reviews.text: Those cards they send you to register your pacemaker are nice but not visible. The bracket is sleek, and visible. I don't have to remove it when I shower. Instructions on removing links was spot on. I only intended to order one but ordered two by mistake. Rather than return it I will gift it to a family member who also has a device.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Alert Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bracelet. I've worn it for about a week now and it feels great. Heavy enough to be high quality yet light enough that it's not a pain to wear. Symbol and print is slightly recessed so hopefully this will aid in longevity. The included tool made it easy to remove links to adjust size. Don't hesitate, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: ZerbR

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable to ware.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of this bracelet and how well made and comfortable it is on my wrist. The adjustment tool included made removing a couple links a breeze. It has a masculine look and will help a medic if I'm not able to respond to questions.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ring

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of the price
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with what I received. It was a little difficult to remove as link as my hands don’t want to cooperate and trying to hold the bracelet and position the device to remove the link was challenging. I did get it removed and put the bracelet back together. I would buy this again. Again it is very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Donna H

customer_reviews.title: It was quite a shock to realize I needed a ...
customer_reviews.text: It was quite a shock to realize I needed a pacemaker. This gives me peace of mind that first responders will know immediately that I have one. Thank you for making one only 1/4 inch in diameter. I already wear a watch band type of medical bracelet and this one just rests next to it....
customer_reviews.author: hopeful

customer_reviews.title: High quality Medic Alert bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I have had a problem with losing my medic alert bracelets and I am so happy that I gave this one a try. It was much too large for my wrist but was very easy to resize and came with a kit to do it. I have been wearing it for 2 months straight, never taking it off and it looks just as good as the day I put it on. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: JesseDBody

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and practical DNR bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I was glad when I found exactly what I wanted - stylish and practical DNR bracelet. At first, it was not allowed to be delivered overseas. After sometime, I got this one finally. I'm very satisfied with the quality of product. It took a while to adjust the length but it was easy to find the way due to instruction paper. The seller was so kind and helpful to send email checking whether it works well. Thank you for selling fine goods. :)
customer_reviews.author: Clincher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I never envisioned a medic alert bracelet could be this attractive. I am very petite and this is perfect for me. I have a living will but during this pandemic I wanted to make sure nobody tries any heroic measures on me. I do not want to end up on a ventilator. Links are simple to remove and replace with the handy tool provided. Quality piece of jewelry. Also arrived a day earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically wanted a bracelet that was durable, and was deeply engraved. Custom engraved bracelets tend to rub smooth over time, and the engraving is lost. I do not have that worry with this one. The engraving is deep, and so far, the enameling has been durable. It also has substantial weight to it, which I like. There is nothing flimsy about it. The tool that comes with it to adjust the length works perfectly, and made removing links simple. The clasp is also strong, and won't catch on anything. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RegedornTrixie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice MedID bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a MedID bracelet that looked more like a piece of jewelry than the run of the mill ID bracelet you normally find in stores. This one is perfect! It does look like a normal bracelet, is shiny and light weight. I had no issue opening or closing it unlike others stated. The tool to remove links will be useful at some point but I prefer to wear it loose as I would any other bracelet. Good quality and workmanship; I would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this medical alert bracelet. It was so easy to take out a couple of links to make it fit. I was quite nervous about taking them out, but it was a breeze snd quick. This is an attractive bracelet. Nobody even realizes it's a medical bracelet. It is made of quality materials. It is holding up well and I never take it off. I forget I even have it on. We'll worth the modest price.
customer_reviews.author: JMN

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and doesn't pinch arm hairs.
customer_reviews.text: Best quality and unlike the "stretch' kind, doesn't pinch arm hairs. If you wear it loosely, however, at night you'll want to wrap some sort of band around it so that it doesn't creep up your arm and cause (mild) discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around.
customer_reviews.text: but this is a gift for my 91-year-old mother and she loves it! It comes with a little kit to take out links if it’s too big. it looks really nice and the message part slides to the inside of her wrist so only the pretty chain shows. Great price we were very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice..
customer_reviews.text: It looks feminine and is very comfortable. I had to remove a couple of links and now it's a perfect fit...slightly loose. It's very well made. I do have a hard time with opening the clasp. Some days I cannot open it..other days it takes many tries. I do recommend this bracelet since it is just the right size and look. (I love the shine) .
customer_reviews.author: L. Connell

customer_reviews.title: An important piece of jewelry for some
customer_reviews.text: My wife doesn't like to wear anything on her wrists, but she is wearing this bracelet. She really doesn’t seem to notice it is there. I took out two links with the included link tool. It now fits very well. You just have to carefully follow the instructions provided and line up the pin holes. Do not force anything or it will not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: agrill4u

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Elegant Medical I.D. Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Adjusting the size of the bracelet is simple with the tool sent with the bracelet. I would suggest using a hands free magnifine glass due to the miniature parts. The bracelet is comfortable and easy to read in an emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!  Easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something a bit more elegant than most of the medical ID bracelets I was seeing. Something that didn't "scream" MEDICAL ID BRACELET. This is what I was looking for. Elegant, beautiful. I've ha number of people comment on how lovely my bracelet is and they are not aware that it is serving a medical function. I needed a little bit larger and was sent extra links to add - perfect! Easy to do myself and now fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: rosindabow

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bracelet-excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is exactly as described. Amazing quality. Gorgeous on the arm. It did not work for me. It was too heavy for me. But, if you don’t mind weight, it’s an excellent choice. I also found that removing the links was an easy process.
customer_reviews.author: Go4theguasto

customer_reviews.title: Slim, unobtrusive medic alert
customer_reviews.text: High quality material, medic alert disguised as jewelry...it's a pleasure to wear...very slim and unobtrusive in everyday wear but the red cross and staff will be prominent to emergency responders . Seller Smarter LifeStyle has excellent customer service, second to none. Frequent contact to make sure order was satisfactory in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is a must have for anyone on special medication or with medical conditions. I am recently off blood thinners but continue to wear it because I love how the basic silver chain looks against my Apple Watch. It is durable and I have never taken it off to shower, pool, anything. Coworkers have since ordered the bracelet for themselves after my encouragement. Thank you for the great product!!
customer_reviews.author: MBranscome

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: I recently found out that I am type 2 diabetic, so I ordered this. It came in yesterday, and I immediately put it on. It's super light weight and super comfortable. I had to take 2 links off to fit it to my wrist better, but it comes with a kit to add or remove links.
customer_reviews.author: Tashia byus

customer_reviews.title: Maintenance free purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got the mens size so it would be loose however, the directions say you can add or remove links. i just wanted it ready to go. I haven’t removed it in 4 months. No issues. And it doesn’t catch on my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and looks great. Couldn't be happier. Just to update, I took a couple of links out and then needed to put one back in, however, I had lost them. I contacted customer service and they immediately shipped out some additional pins free of charge and even paid the postage. This is a great company with a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Harper

customer_reviews.title: Get one if you have a fistula
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for those with a fistula. Heathcare workers and EMT's must know that arm is off limits to blood draws or blood pressure cuffs. Even with the ID bracelet installed, I have to constantly remind healthcare workers to stay clear of that arm. They don't always look.
customer_reviews.author: Greg From Oro Valley AZ

customer_reviews.title: Pre engraved and quick receipt made it a quick resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to be a reminder for myself and the medical team. Fits great and as expected. The ability to size it myself was convenient and needed. It made the difference for me in choices. It is a great option for minimal information however I also invested in dog tags to highlight multiple medical needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ketsy Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bracelet- much nicer than I anticipated. I bought this as a temporary add on to my existing bracelet (just started Xarelto but will be getting a pacemaker this summer). I will be coming back after my pacemaker and getting a new bracelet here. Link removal tool is nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Ink disappeared
customer_reviews.text: Its comfortable, but now l had since December and the black ink has wore off.Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Diana Saullo

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with Great Service from Smarter Lifestyle.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the women's DNR bracelet from Smarter Lifestyle. It arrived promptly and I was pleased as it was just as advertised. A device to aid the addition (or removal) ) of extra links was included too. I never took the bracelet off but after about three weeks, a pin holding a link failed. I contacted Smarter Lifestyle and asked for replacement pins to reattach the link. Not only did they send the pins but included extra links too. They were sent by first class mail at no cost to me. I replaced the pin using the device included in the original purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Bendall

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father, who has been fighting melanoma for 4 years. He was told that the treatments are no longer working. He was very eased with the comfort and appearance of the braclet.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Riley

product_meta.title: Elegant Surgical Grade Steel Medical Alert ID Bracelet for Men and Women (Women's, Type 2 Diabetes)
feature_bullets: EMERGENCIES: Your medical ID bracelet can provide quick recognition of your medical conditions, which can lead to faster and proper care in the event of an emergency situation. Most first responders and medical personnel are trained to look for medical ID's during emergencies!

FUNCTIONAL & ELEGANT: Designed to be highly visible to emergency responders, but also with elegance in mind. Finally a medical alert bracelet that is stylish and not an eyesore. Don't be surprised if you receive compliments!

SURGICAL GRADE STEEL: Handcrafted with 100% True 316L Steel. Not the cheap stuff found in other ID bracelets. Polished finish that will not crack, peel, fade, rust, stain or corrode. Often used in surgical equipment and certain medical implants. Strong low-profile clasp that stays put.

ADJUSTABLE: Designed to be comfortable and easy to wear. Easily adjust the size of the bracelet in the comfort of your own home with the free included link removal tool. Extra links can be provided by request for an optimal fit. Length: ~7.85in; Width: ~0.24in

PRESENTATION & GUARANTEE: Beautiful velvet gift bag and elegant gift box make a great present for most any occasion (holiday, birthday, anniversary). We stand behind our products and will always honor our no questions asked return policy.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
